examples.title: Example Usage

Success 200.description: returns the article object that was created

examples.title: Success
examples.content:
{
    "message": "Article created successfully!",
    "article": {
        "__v": 0,
        "title": "Test Article",
        "subtitle": "Testing the article",
        "content": "Such a cool article",
        "_id": "596aae5996febaa323f9a5c2",
        "comments": [],
        "updatedAt": "2017-07-16T00:07:53.979Z",
        "createdAt": "2017-07-16T00:07:53.978Z",
        "thumbnailImage": "http://www.racialjusticenetwork.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/default-profile-picture.png"
    }
}

title: Create a new comment on an article
name: CreateComment

Success 200.description: returns the comment created on the article

title: Retrieve all the articles in the database
name: RetrieveAllArticles

Success 200.description: returns a list of all the articles in the database

examples.title: Success
examples.content:
{
    "articles": [
        {
            "_id": "596a423fc3996c45c07e8e65",
            "title": "Test Article",
            "subtitle": "Testing the article",

        },
        {

title: Retrieves all the comments on an article
name: RetrieveAllComments

Success 200.description: returns all the comments on the article with specified ID

title: Retrieve a specific article by its object ID
name: RetrieveArticleByID

Success 200.description: returns a single article of the ID specified

examples.title: Success
